1 Tout.name: Feast of El-Nayrouz (Beginning of the Blessed Coptic Year).
The Martyrdom of St. Bartholomew, the Apostle.
The Departure of St. Melyos (Milius), the Third Pope of Alexandria.

2 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of St. John the Baptist.
The Martyrdom of St. Dasya the Soldier.

3 Tout.name: A Council held in the city of Alexandria.
A Great Earthquake took place in Cairo and Most of the Egyptian Cities.

4 Tout.name: The Departure of St. Macarius, 69th Pope of Alexandria

6 Tout.name: The Departure of Isaiah the Prophet.

7 Tout.name: The Departure of St. Dioscorus, 25th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Agathon, Peter, John, Amun and Amuna and Their Mother, Rebecca.
The Departure of St. Severianus, Bishop of Gabala.

8 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of Zacharias the Prophet.
The Departure of Moses the Prophet.

9 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of St. Pisora the Bishop

10 Tout.name: The Commemoration of Sts. Basin and Her Children.

12 Tout.name: The Assembly of the Third Ecumenical Council at Ephesus to Judge Nestorius, Archbishop of Constantinople.
The Translocation of the Relics of Sts. Clemus (Aklimos) and His Companions.

13 Tout.name: The Departure of Pope Mattheos II, 90th Patriarch of the See of St. Mark.
The Commemoration of the Miracle performed by St. Basilius (Basil), Bishop of Caesarea, Cappadocia.

14 Tout.name: The Departure of St. Agathon the Stylite

15 Tout.name: Translocation of the Body of St. Stephen the Archdeacon

16 Tout.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Sanctuaries of the church of Resurrection in Jerusalem.
The Translocation of the Relics of St. John Chrysostom (of the Golden Mouth).

17 Tout.name: The Feast of the Consecration of the Church of the Honorable Cross.

18 Tout.name: The Commemoration of Stephen the Priest, and St. Niceta (Niketa) the Martyr.

19 Tout.name: The Commemoration of St. Gregory, Patriarch of the Armenians

20 Tout.name: The Departure of pope Athanasius the Second, the Twenty-Eighth Patriarch of the See of St. Mark.
The Martyrdom of St. Melitina the Virgin.

21 Tout.name: The Commemoration of the Virgin St. Mary, the Theotokos.
The Martyrdom of St. Cyprian (Cyprianus) and St. Justina.

22 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of Saints Cotylas (Kobtlas) and Axoua, his Sister, and Tatas, his Friend.
The Martyrdom of St. Julius of Aqfahs (El-Akfehasi), the Writer of the Biography of Martyrs.

23 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Eunapios (Onanius) and Andrew.
The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Thecla.
The Re-Opening of the church of the Virgin in Haret El-Rum.

24 Tout.name: The Departure of St. Gregory the Ascetic.
The Martyrdom of St. Quadratus, One of the Seventy Disciples.

25 Tout.name: The Departure of Jonah, the Great Prophet

26 Tout.name: The Angels' Annunciation of John the Baptist to Zacharias

27 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of St. Eustathius and His Two Sons

28 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of Saints Abadir (Apater) and Eraee (Herai), His Sister

29 Tout.name: The Martyrdom of St. Arbsima (Repsima) the Virgin and Her Sisters the Virgins

30 Tout.name: The Commemoration of the Miracle that God Performed for St. Athanasius the Apostolic

2 Baba.name: The Coming of Saint Severus, Patriarch of Antioch, to Egypt

3 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Simon II, 51st Pope of the See of St. Mark.
The Martyrdom of St. John the Soldier.

4 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Bacchus, the Friend of St. Sergius

5 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Paul, Patriarch of Constantinople

6 Baba.name: The Departure of the Righteous Hannah, the Prophetess Mother of Samuel, the Prophet

7 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Paul of Tamouh

8 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of the Saints Abba Hor, Tosia (Susanna) and Her Children, and Abba Agathon, the Hermit.

9 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Eumenius, the Seventh Pope of the See of St. Mark.
The Eclipse of the Sun in the Year 958 A.M.
The Commemoration of St. Simon (Simeon) the Bishop.

10 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Sergius, the Friend of St. Bacchus

11 Baba.name: The Departure of St. James, Patriarch of Antioch.

12 Baba.name: The Departure of Abba Demetrius I, 12th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Matthew the Evangelist.
The Commemoration of the Archangel Michael.

13 Baba.name: The Departure of Saint Zacharias, the Monk

14 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Philip, One of the Seven Deacons

15 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Panteleimon, the Physician

16 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Agathon, 39th Pope of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of the Sts. Carpus, Apollos (Papylus) and Peter.

17 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Dioscorus II 31st Pope of Alexandria

18 Baba.name: The Departure of the Honorable Father Saint Theophilus 23rd Pope of Alexandria

19 Baba.name: The Assembly of the Council of Antioch against Paul of Samosata.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Theophilus and His Wife in Fayyum.

20 Baba.name: The Departure of the Great St. John Colobos (the Short)

21 Baba.name: The Commemoration of the Relocation of the Body of Lazarus.
The Departure of Joel the Prophet.
The Departure of St. Freig (Abba Tegi, Anba Roweiss).

22 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Luke the Evangelist

23 Baba.name: The Departure of St. Yousab, 52nd Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Dionysius, Bishop of Corinth.

24 Baba.name: The Departure of the Righteous Father Abba Hilarion.
The Martyrdom of the Sts. Paul, Longinus and Deenah (Zena).

25 Baba.name: The Departure of the Saints Apollo and Abib.
The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of Saint Julius El-Akfahsee (Aqfahs).

26 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Timon the Apostle.
The Commemoration of the Seven Martyrs on the Mount of St. Antonius.

27 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of the Righteous Father Saint Macarius Bishop of Edkow (Tkoou)

28 Baba.name: Martyrdom of the Sts. Marcian (Marcianus) and Mercurius

29 Baba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Demetrius of Thessalonica

30 Baba.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of St. Mark the Evangelist and the Appearance of His Holy Head.
The Departure of St. Ibrahim (Ibraham) the Hermit.

1 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of the Saints Maximus, Numitius, Victor (Boctor), and Philip (Philopus).
The Commemoration of Saint Cleopas the Apostle and His Companion.

2 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Peter the Third 27th Pope of Alexandria

3 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Athanasius and His Sister, Irene.

4 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of Saints John and James, Bishops of Persia.
The Martyrdom of Saints Epimachus and Adrianus (Azarianus).

5 Hator.name: The Appearance of the Head of St. Longinus, the Soldier.
The Martyrdom of St. Timothy and the Relocation of the Body of St. Theodore, the Prince, to Shotb.

6 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Felix, Pope of Rome.
The Consecration of the church of the Virgin in the Mouharaque Monastery in Quosquam Mount.

7 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. George of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Mina, Bishop of Tamai (Thmoui).
The Consecration of the Church of St. George of Cappadocia.

8 Hator.name: The Commemoration of the Four Incorporeal Beasts

9 Hator.name: The Departure of the Holy Father Anba Isaac, 41st Pope of Alexandria.
The Assembly of the Ecumenical Council at Nicea.

10 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. Sophia and the Fifty Virgins with her.
The Assembly of a Council in Rome because of the Feast of Theophany and Lent.

11 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Anna (Hannah), the mother of the Theotokos.
The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Archelaus and the Martyrdom of Elisha the Hegumen.

12 Hator.name: The Commemoration of the Honored Archangel Michael

13 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Timothy, Bishop of Ansena (Antinoe).
The Departure of St. Zacharias, 64th Pope of Alexandria.

14 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Martinus (Martin) Bishop of Tours (Thrace)

15 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Mari-Mina, the Wonder Worker

16 Hator.name: The Beginning of the Fast of the Nativity (Advent) in the Coptic Church.
The Consecration of the Church of St. Abu-Nofer (Onuphrius).
The Martyrdom of Saint Yostus, the Bishop.

17 Hator.name: The Departure of Saint John Chrysostom

18 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of the Two Saints: Atrasis and Yoana (Junia).
The Martyrdom of Saint Philip the Apostle.

19 Hator.name: The Consecration of the Church of St. Sergius and St. Bacchus.
The Commemoration of the Preaching of St. Bartholomew, the Apostle.

20 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Anianus, 2nd Pope of Alexandria.
The Consecration of the Churches of Prince Theodore, the Son of John El-Shotbe, and Prince Theodore El-Mishreke.

21 Hator.name: The Commemoration of the Virgin St. Mary, the Theotokos.
The Departure of Saint Gregory, the Wonder Worker.
The Departure of Saint Cosma, 54th Pope of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of the Holy Martyrs Alphaeus, Zacchaeus, Romanus and John, and the Commemoration of the Saints Thomas, Victor, and Isaac of the City of Ashmunen.

22 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of Saints Cosmas, Damian, Their Brothers and Their Mother

23 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Cornelius the Centurion.
The Consecration of the Church of St. Marina.

24 Hator.name: The Commemoration of the Twenty-Four Priests

25 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. Mercurius Known as the Saint with the Two Swords

26 Hator.name: The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of the Sts. Valerian (Balaryanos) and Tiburcius (Thiborinos), His Brother.
The Commemoration of St. Gregory, Bishop of Nyssa.

27 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Mangled (Sawn).

28 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. Sarapamon, Bishop of Niku.

29 Hator.name: The Martyrdom of St. Peter, the Seal of the Martyrs, 17th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Clement, Pope of Rome.

30 Hator.name: The Departure of St. Acacius, Patriarch of Constantinople.
The Consecration of the Church of Saints Cosmas, Damian, Their Brothers and Their Mother.

1 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. Peter Elrahawy, Bishop of Gaza.
The Consecration of the Church of the Saint Abba Shenouda.

2 Kiahk.name: The Departure of the Saint Abba Hor, the Monk.

3 Kiahk.name: The Entrance of Saint Mary into the Temple at Jerusalem.

4 Kiahk.name: The Martyrdom of St. Andrew the Apostle, the Brother of St. Peter.

5 Kiahk.name: The Departure of Nahum, the Prophet.

7 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. Matthew the Poor.

8 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. Heraclas (Theoclas), 13th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of the Saints: Barbara and Juliana.
The Martyrdom of the Saints: Esi (Isi) and His Sister Thecla.
The Departure of St. Samuel the Abbot of El-Qualamon Monastery (Abba Samuel the Confessor).
The departure of St. Yustus, the monk of St. Anthony's monastery.

9 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. Poemin, the Confessor.

10 Kiahk.name: The Relocation of the Body of St. Severus, Patriarch of Antioch.
The Departure of St. Nicholas, the Confessor, Bishop of Myra (Mora).

11 Kiahk.name: The Departure of the Saint Abba Pijimi.

12 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of the Honorable Michael, the Archangel.
The Departure of St. Hedra, Bishop of Aswan.
The Commemoration of St. John the Confessor.
Assembly of a Council in Rome Against Benates (Novatus) the Priest.

13 Kiahk.name: The Consecration of the Church of St. Misaeal (Misayil), the Anchorite.

14 Kiahk.name: The Martyrdom of Saints Behnam and Sarah, His Sister.
The Martyrdom of Saints Simeon of Menouf, Abba Hor, and Abba Mina the Elder.
The Martyrdom of Saint Ammonius, Bishop of Esna (Latopolis).

15 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. Gregory, Patriarch of the Armenians.

16 Kiahk.name: The Departure of the Righteous Gideon, One of the Judges of Israel.
The Martyrdom of Saints Harouadi, Ananias and Khouzi.
The Consecration of the Church of St. James, the Persian.

17 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of the Departure of St. Luke the Stylite and the Relocation of His Holy Relics.

18 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of the Relocation of the Relics of St. Titus to Constantinople.
The Commemoration of St. Heracleas the Martyr and St. Philemon the Priest.

19 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. John, Bishop of El-Borollos Who Gathered the Biographies of the Saints (The Synaxarion).

20 Kiahk.name: The Departure of the Upright Haggai the Prophet.

21 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of the Virgin Mary, the Theotokos.
The Martyrdom of St. Barnabas, One of the Seventy Apostles.

22 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of the Archangel Gabriel.
The Departure of St. Anastasius, 36th Pope of Alexandria.

23 Kiahk.name: The Departure of David, the Prophet and King.
The Departure of St. Timothy, the Anchorite.

24 Kiahk.name: The Martyrdom of St. Ignatius, Patriarch of Antioch.
The Departure of St. Philogonus, Patriarch of Antioch.
The Birth of St. Takla Haymanot, the Ethiopian.

25 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. John Kama (Khame).

26 Kiahk.name: The Commemoration of St. Juliana the Martyr.

27 Kiahk.name: The Martyrdom of St. Anba "Bisadi" (Psote), the Bishop.

28 Kiahk.name: The Martyrdom of 150 Men and 24 Women from Ansena.

29 Kiahk.name: The Feast of the Nativity of Our Lord Jesus Christ (Christmas).

30 Kiahk.name: The Departure of St. John, Archpriest of Scetis.

1 Toba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Stephen the Archdeacon.

2 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Theonas, 16th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Callinicus (Gallinicus), Bishop of Oseem.

3 Toba.name: The Commemoration of the Slain Children of Bethlehem by the Order of King Herod

4 Toba.name: The Departure of St. John the Evangelist and Theologian

6 Toba.name: The Commemoration of the Circumcision of the Lord Christ.
The Ascension of Elijah the Prophet.
The Departure of St. Marcianus, 8th Pope of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Basil the Great, Bishop Of Caesarea.

7 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Sylvester, Pope of Rome

8 Toba.name: Consecration of The Church of Saint Macarius the Great

9 Toba.name: The Departure of Abba Abraam, Companion of Abba Gawarga.

11 Toba.name: The Holy Theophany of Our Lord, God and Savior, Jesus Christ (Baptism of the Lord christ).

12 Toba.name: The Commemoration of the Archangel Michael.
The Martyrdom of St. Theodore El-Mishreke (the Oriental).

13 Toba.name: The Commemoration of the Miracle at Cana of Galilee.
The Departure of St. Theophilus, the Monk.

14 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Maximus, Brother of St. Domadius (Domatius).

15 Toba.name: The Departure of Obadiah, the Prophet.

16 Toba.name: The Departure of St. John IV, 48th Pope of Alexandria.

17 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Maximus and St. Domatius (Domadius).
The Departure of Anba Yusab, Bishop of Girga, known as El- Abbah.

18 Toba.name: The Departure of St. James, Bishop of Nisibis.

19 Toba.name: The Discovery of the Relics of St. Abahor (Pihour) St. Bisoura (Pisoura) and their Mother Ampira (Asra).

20 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Prochorus, One of the Seventy Disciples.

The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of St. John, the Owner of the Golden Gospel, and the Transfer of His Relics to It. Also, the Commemoration of the Martyrdom of Anba Behna (Bahnou) and Anba Kloag (Bagoug), the Priest.

21 Toba.name: The Dormition of Our Lady, the Virgin Mary, the Theotokos.
The Departure of St. Hilaria, Daughter of Emperor Zeno.
The Departure of St. Gregorius (Gregory of Nyssa), Brother of St. Basil the Great.

22 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Anthony the Great (Antonius).

23 Toba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Timothy, the Apostle.
The Departure of Pope Cyril IV (Kyrillos), 110th Pope of Alexandria.

24 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Mary the Ascetic (The Shut-In).
The Martyrdom of Anba Bisada (St. Psati), the Priest.

25 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Peter, the Worshipper.
The Martyrdom of St. Askala (Asela), the Ascetic.

26 Toba.name: The Martyrdom of the Forty-Nine Saints, the Elders of Sheheat (Scetis).

27 Toba.name: The Commemoration of the Archangel Suriel.
The Relocation of the Relics of St. Timothy, the Apostle.
The Martyrdom of St. Abe-Fam, the Soldier (St. Phoebammon).

28 Toba.name: The Martyrdom of St. Anba Kaou.

29 Toba.name: The Departure of St. Eksani (St. Xene).
The Commemoration of St. Seriakos (Syriacus), the Fighter.

30 Toba.name: The Martyrdom of Saints Pistis, Helpis, Agape, and Their Mother, Sophia.

1 Amshir.name: The Commemoration of the Ecumenical Council in Constantinople.
The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of St. Peter, the Seal of Martyrs.

2 Amshir.name: The Departure of the Great Saint Anba Paul, the First Hermit.
The Departure of St. Longinus, Abbot of El-Zugag Monastery.

3 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. James, the Ascetic.

4 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Agabus, One of the Seventy Disciples.

5 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Agrippinus, 10th Pope of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of the Saints Anba Bishay and Anba Abanoub.
The Departure of St. Apollo, friend of Anba Abib.
The Commemoration of the Relocation of the Relics of the Forty-Nine Elders of the Wilderness of Shiheet (Scetis).

6 Amshir.name: The Appearance of the Body of St. Apolidus (Hippolytus), Pope of Rome.
The Martyrdom of the Saints Abakir, John, the Three Virgins and Their Mother.

7 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Fabianus (Fabrianus), Pope of Rome.

8 Amshir.name: The Feast of Presenting the Lord Christ in the Temple.

9 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Severus, Patriarch of Antioch.
The Departure of St. James (Yacobus), 50th Pope of Alexandria.

10 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Apostle, Son of Alphaeus.
The Martyrdom of St. Justus, Son of Emperor Numerian.
The Departure of St. Isidore of Pelusium.
The Martyrdom of St. Philo, Bishop of the Persian.

11 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Fabianus (Fabrianus), Pope of Rome.

12 Amshir.name: The Commemoration of the Archangel Michael.

13 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Sergius of Atripe, His Father, Mother, Sister, and Many Others with Them.
The Departure of St. Timothy III, 32nd Pope of Alexandria.

14 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Severus, Patriarch of Antioch.
The Departure of St. James (Yacobus), 50th Pope of Alexandria.

15 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Zechariah, the Prophet.
The Consecration of the First Church Dedicated for the Forty Martyrs of Sebaste.

17 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Mina (Menas), the Monk.

18 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Malatius the Confessor, Patriarch of Antioch.

19 Amshir.name: The Commemoration of the Relocation of the Relics of St. Martianus, the Monk.

20 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Peter, 21st Pope of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of Sts. Basil, Theodore and Timothy, the Martyrs.

21 Amshir.name: The Commemoration of the Virgin St. Mary.
The Martyrdom of St. Onesimus, the Disciple of St. Paul.
The Departure of St. Gabriel, 57th Pope of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Zacharias, Bishop of Sakha.

22 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Maruta (Maruthas) the Bishop.

23 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Eusebius, Son of Basilides, the Minister.

24 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Agapetus (Agapius), the Bishop.
The Martyrdom of St. Timothy and St. Matthias.

25 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Archippus, Philemon and Lycia the Virgin.
The Martyrdom of St. Quona (Kona) and St. Mina.

26 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Hosea, the Prophet.
The Martyrdom of St. Zadok and the 128 who were with Him.

27 Amshir.name: The Departure of St. Eustathius, Patriarch of Antioch.

28 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Theodore, the Roman.

29 Amshir.name: The Martyrdom of St. Polycarp, Bishop of Smyrna.

30 Amshir.name: The Appearance of the Head of St. John the Baptist.
Abba Kyrillos the Sixth, the 116th Pope of Alexandria.

2 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of St. Macrobius (Makrawy) the Bishop.

3 Baramhat.name: The Departure of St. Cosmas, the Fifty-Eighth Pope of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Hadid the priest.

4 Baramhat.name: Assembly of the Holy Council on the island of Bani-Omar.
The Martyrdom of St. Haboulyous (Hanulius) the prince.

5 Baramhat.name: The Departure of Anba Serapamon, Archpriest of Abba Yehnis (John) monastery.
Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Eudexia (Eutychia).
The Martyrdom of St. Peter the priest.

6 Baramhat.name: The Departure of St. Theodotus, the bishop.

7 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Philemon and Apollonius.
The Martyrdom of St. Mary the Israelite.

8 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of St. Matthias, the apostle.
The Departure of St. Julian, the Eleventh Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Arianus, the Governor of Ansena.

9 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Abrianus, Amrata his wife, Eusebius, Armanius, and the Forty Martyrs.

10 Baramhat.name: Commemoration Of the Appearance Of The Glorious Cross.

11 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom Of St. Basil (Basilaos) The Bishop.

12 Baramhat.name: The Commemoration of the Honorable Angel Michael.
The Commemoration of the revealing of the virginity of St. Demetrius the Twelfth Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Malachias of Palestine.
The Martyrdom of St. Glathinos in Damascus.

13 Baramhat.name: The Departure of Abba Dionysius, the Fourteenth Pope of Alexandria.
The Return of the Great Sts. Anba Macarius the Great and Anba Macarius of Alexandria, from Exile.
The Martyrdom of the Forty Martyrs of Sebastia.

14 Baramhat.name: The Departure of Anba Kyrellos (Cyril) the Seventy Fifth Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Shenouda (Sinouti) El Bahnasawy.
The Martyrdom of the Sts. Eugenius, Agathodorus and Elpidius.

15 Baramhat.name: The Departure of St. Sarah the nun.
The Martyrdom of St. Helias of Hnes.

16 Baramhat.name: The Departure Of The Saint Anba Khail (Mikhail) The Forty Six Pope Of The See Of St. Mark.

17 Baramhat.name: The Departure of Lazarus, the beloved of the Lord.
The Commemoration of the Sts. George the ascetic, Belasius the martyr, and Anba Joseph the bishop.
The Departure of St. Basilius, Bishop of Jerusalem.
The Martyrdom of St. Sedhom Bishay in Domiat.

18 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of St. Isidore, Friend of Sina the Soldier.

19 Baramhat.name: The Martyrdom of St. Aristobulus, the apostle.
The Martyrdom of the Sts. Alexander, Agabius, Alexander, Timol (Timolaos), Dionysius, Romulus, and Blesius (Valesius).

20 Baramhat.name: The Departure Of the St. Anba Khail (Mikhail) the Fifty Six Pope of the See of St. Mark.
Raising of Lazarus from the dead.

21 Baramhat.name: Commemoration of the Theotokos and Ever-Virgin St. Mary
Commemoration of the visit of Our Lord Christ to Bethany
Consultation of the Chief Priests to put the righteous Lazarus to death

22 Baramhat.name: The Departure of St. Kyrellos (Cyril), Bishop of Jerusalem.
The Departure of St. Michael, Bishop of Naqadah.

23 Baramhat.name: The Departure of the Great Prophet Daniel.

24 Baramhat.name: The Apparition of the Pure Lady the Virgin in the church of Zeiton.
The Departure of Anba Macarius, the Fifty-Ninth Pope of Alexandria.

25 Baramhat.name: The Commemoration of the Crucifixion of Our Lord Jesus Christ.
The Departure of St. Macarius the Great.

26 Baramhat.name: The Departure of St. Euphrasia (Eupraxia), the virgin.
The Departure of Pope Peter VI, the One Hundred and Fourth Pope of Alexandria.

27 Baramhat.name: The Commemoration of the Crucifixion of Our Lord Jesus Christ.
The Departure of St. Macarius the Great.

28 Baramhat.name: The Departure of the righteous Emperor Constantine the Great.
The Departure of Pope Peter (Petros) VII, the One Hundred and Ninth Patriarch.
The commemoration of Anba Sarapamon, known as "The Veiled" Bishop of El-Monofia.

29 Baramhat.name: The Commemoration of the Life giving Annunciation.
The Commemoration of the Resurrection of the Lord Christ from the dead.

30 Baramhat.name: The Commemoration of the Archangel Gabriel the Announcer.
The Commemoration of the Transfer of the Relies of St. James, known as the Mangled.
The Commemoration of Samson, One of the Judges of Israel.

1 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of the Holy Virgins: Agape, Eirene, and Shiona.
The Martyrdom of the One Hundred and Fifty believers by the hand of king of Persia.

2 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Apostle Brother of St. John the Apostle.

3 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. John, Bishop of Jerusalem.
The Departure of the holy father Anba Michael, the Seventy First Pope of the See of St. Mark.

4 Baramouda.name: The Departure of Anba Isaac, the Disciple of Anba Apollo.
The Departure of Pope Gabriel II, the Seventy Pope of Alexandria, who was known as Ibn Turaik.

5 Baramouda.name: The Commemoration of the Great Prophet Ezekiel, the son of Buzi.
The Martyrdom of St. Hepatius, Bishop of Gangra.

6 Baramouda.name: The Commemoration of the Appearance of the Lord to Thomas the Apostle after His Resurrection.
The Departure of St. Mary of Egypt.

7 Baramouda.name: The Departure of the Righteous Joachim, The Lord Christ Grandfather.
The Departure of Sts. Agapius, Theodora, and Metruf.

8 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of the Holy Virgins: Agape, Eirene, and Shiona.
The Martyrdom of the One Hundred and Fifty believers by the hand of king of Persia.

9 Baramouda.name: The commemoration of the Wonder that took place on the hand of Pope Sinuthius (Shenouda I) the Fifty Fifth Patriarch.

10 Baramouda.name: The Departure of Anba Isaac, the Disciple of Anba Apollo.
The Departure of Pope Gabriel II, the Seventy Pope of Alexandria, who was known as Ibn Turaik.

11 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. John, Bishop of Gaza.

12 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. Alexander, Bishop of Jerusalem.
The Commemoration of St. Antonios, Bishop of Tamoui.

13 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of the Sts. Joshua and Joseph.
The Commemoration of Dionisa (Denisa) the Deaconess and Medius the Martyr.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Seventeenth, the 105th. Patriarch of Alexandria.

14 Baramouda.name: The Departure of the Holy Father Anba Maximus The Fifteenth Pope of Alexandria.

15 Baramouda.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the first altar for St. Nicholas, Bishop of Mora for the Jacobite Christians.
The Commemoration of the Consecration of the church of St. Agabus, the Apostle.
The Departure of St. Alexandra, the Empress.
The Departure of Pope Mark (Marcus) VI, the 101st. Patriarch.

16 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. Antipas, Bishop of Pergamos.

17 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Apostle Brother of St. John the Apostle.

18 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. Arsenius, Slave of St. Sousnyous.

19 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. Simeon the Armenian, Bishop of the country of Persia and 150 with him.
The Martyrdom of the blessed Youhanna (John) Abu Nagaah El-Kabeer.
The Martyrdom of the Vizier Abu Elaala Fahd ibn Ibrahim and his companions.
The Martyrdom of Daoud (David), the Monk.

21 Baramouda.name: The Commemoration of the Lady the Theotokos.
The Departure of St. Hierotheos, of Athens.

22 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. Isaac (Ishaq), of Hourin.
The Departure of St. Alexander I, 19th Pope of the See of St. Mark.
The Departure of St. Mark 11, 49th Pope of the See of St. Mark.
The Departure of St. Michael 11, 53rd Pope of the See of St. Mark.

23 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. George Prince of the Martyrs.

24 Baramouda.name: The Departure of Pope Sinuthius (Shenouda I), 55th Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Sina, the Soldier.

25 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of St. Sarah, and her two sons.
The Commemoration of Sts. Babnuda (Paphnute) the hermit, Theodore the worshipper, and the One hundred martyrs.

26 Baramouda.name: The Departure of Pope Youannis VII, 78th. Patriarch.

27 Baramouda.name: Martyrdom of St. Boctor Ebn Romanus

28 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. Helena, The Empress.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Eleventh, the 89th. Patriarch of Alexandra.
The Departure of St. Gabriel the Eighth, the 97th. Patriarch of Alexandria.

29 Baramouda.name: The Departure of St. Erastus, the Apostle.
The Departure of St. Acacius, Bishop of Jerusalem.

30 Baramouda.name: The Martyrdom of the Great Saint Mark, the Apostle The Evangelist of the Land of Egypt.

1 Bashons.name: The Nativity of the Blessed Virgin Mary The Mother of God.

2 Bashons.name: The Departure of the righteous Job.
The Departure of St. Tadros (Theodore), the disciple of St. Pachomius.

3 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Jason, one of the Seventy disciples.
The Departure of St. Otimus, the Priest.
The Departure of Pope Gabriel IV, the 86th. Patriarch of Alexandria.

4 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Helena, The Empress.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Eleventh, the 89th. Patriarch of Alexandra.
The Departure of St. Gabriel the Eighth, the 97th. Patriarch of Alexandria.

5 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom of St. Jeremiah the Prophet.

6 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom of St. Isaac El-Defrawi.
The Departure of St. Macarius of Alexandria.
The Departure of Father Paphnute of El-Bandarah.

7 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Athanasius the Apostolic the 20th. Pope of Alexandria.

8 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom of St. John of Senhout.
The Departure of St. Daniel the Archpriest of Sheahat (Scetis).

9 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Helena, The Empress.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Eleventh, the 89th. Patriarch of Alexandra.
The Departure of St. Gabriel the Eighth, the 97th. Patriarch of Alexandria.

10 Bashons.name: The Departure of the Three Hebrew Young Men Hananiah, Azariah and Mishael.

11 Bashons.name: The Departure Of St. Simon the Stylite.

12 Bashons.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the church of St. Demiana.
The Commemoration of the Relocation of the relics of St. John Chrysostom.
The Commemoration of the Appearance of a Cross of light above Golgotha.
The Departure of Pope Mark the Seventh, the 106th. Patriarch of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of Master (Moallem) Malati.

13 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Junia, One of the Seventy Disciples.
The Martyrdom of St. Julian (Yulianus) and his mother in Alexandria.

14 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Pachomius (Pakhom), the Father of the Spiritual Communal Monastic life (Cenobitic life).
The Martyrdom of St. Epimachus (Ephimachus) of Pelusium.

15 Bashons.name: The Departure Of St. Simon the Stylite.

16 Bashons.name: The Commemoration of St. John The Evangelist.

17 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Epiphanius, Bishop of Cyprus.

18 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. George (Ga'orgi), the Friend of St. Abraam.
The Commemoration of the feast of Pentecost.

19 Bashons.name: The Commemoration of the Departure of Abba Isaac, the Priest of El-Qalali (Cells).
The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Isidorus (Isidore) of Antioch.

20 Bashons.name: The Departure Of St. Ammonius The Hermit.

21 Bashons.name: Commemoration of the Holy and Pure Virgin Mary

22 Bashons.name: The Departure of St. Andronicus One of the Seventy Disciples.

23 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom of St. Colluthus of Antinoe (Known as Abu Colta).
The Departure of the most honored Layman Ibrahim El-Gohari.

24 Bashons.name: The Departure Of St. Simon the Stylite.

25 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom of St. Colluthus of Antinoe (Known as Abu Colta).
The Departure of the most honored Layman Ibrahim El-Gohari.

26 Bashons.name: The Martyrdom Of St. Thomas, the Apostle.

27 Bashons.name: The Departure of Pope Youannis the Second, the 30th. Patriarch of the See of St. Mark.
The Departure of Lazarus the beloved of the Lord.

28 Bashons.name: The commemoration of the Relocation of the Body of St. Epiphanius.

29 Bashons.name: The Departure Of St. Simon the Stylite.

30 Bashons.name: The Departure of Pope Mikhail the First, the 68th. Patriarch of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Fournous, one of the seventy disciples.

1 Paona.name: The Consecration of the church of St. Leontius of Tripoli.
The Martyrdom of St. Qozman El-Tahawy and his companions.
The Consecration of the church of St. Abe-Fam (Epipham) the soldier.

2 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the Appearance of the Bodies of St. John the Baptist and Elisha the Prophet.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Eighteenth, the 107th. Pope of Alexandria.

3 Paona.name: The Construction of the first church of St. George in the cities of Birma and Beer Maa (Water Well) in the Oases.
The Departure of St. Martha of Egypt.
The Martyrdom of St. Alladius the Bishop.
The Departure of Pope Cosmas, the 44th Patriarch.
The Departure of St. Abraam, bishop of El-Fayyoum.

4 Paona.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Anba Amoun and the Righteous Sophia.
The Martyrdom of John of Herakleia.
The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Eighth (80th Patriarch).

5 Paona.name: The Departure of St. James of the East.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Anba Bshay (Ebsoy) and Anba Botros (Peter).
The Commemoration of the Consecration of the church of St. Boctor (Victor) in the region of Sho.

6 Paona.name: The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Nineteenth, 113th Patriarch of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Apakir, John, Ptolemy and Philip.

7 Paona.name: The Martyrdom of St. Abaskhiroun the Soldier.

8 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of the Virgin Lady known as El-Mahammah.
The Commemoration of St. Tamada and her children, and Armenius and his mother.
The Martyrdom of George (Girgis) the new martyr.

9 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Altar of the Forty Martyrs in Alexandria.

10 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the Closing of the Pagan Temples and Opening of the Churches.
The Departure of St. Yoannis the 16th, the 103rd Pope of Alexandria.
The Enthronement of Pope Demitrius the Second, the 111th Patriarch of Alexandria.

11 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Altar of the Forty Martyrs in Alexandria.

12 Paona.name: The Departure of St. Justus, the Sixth Pope of the See of St. Mark.
The Departure of St. Kyrillos the Second, the 67th Pope of Alexandria.

13 Paona.name: The Departure of St. John, Bishop of Jerusalem.
The Commemoration of the Archangel Gabriel, the Announcer of Daniel the Prophet.

14 Paona.name: The Departure of Pope Yoannis the Nineteenth, 113th Patriarch of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Apakir, John, Ptolemy and Philip.

15 Paona.name: The Turning Over of the Relics of the Great St. Mark the Apostle by the hand of Pope Paul the Sixth, Pope of Rome.
The Consecration of the Church of Mari Mina at Maryut.

16 Paona.name: The Departure of St. Abba Nofer the Anchorite.

17 Paona.name: The Return of the Relics of the Great St. Mark to the New St. Mark Cathedral.
The Departure of St. Latsoun El-Bahnasawy.

18 Paona.name: The Inauguration of the New St. Mark Cathedral in the Monastery of Anba Rowais.
The Departure of St. Damianos, 35th Pope of Alexandria.

19 Paona.name: The First Pontifical Liturgy in the New St. Mark Cathedral in the Monastery of Anba Rowais.
The Departure of Pope Archelaus, the Eighteenth Pope of Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. George (Girgis) known as El-Mezahem.
The Martyrdom of St. Bishai Anoub.

20 Paona.name: The Departure of Elisha, the Prophet.

21 Paona.name: The Commemoration of the First Church for The Virgin Mary in the city of Philippi.
The Martyrdom of St. Timothy of Memphis (El-Masry).
The Departure of St. Cedron (Kardonos), the Fourth Patriarch of Alexandria.

22 Paona.name: The Consecration of the Church of Sts. Cosmas, Damian, Their Mother, and Brothers.

23 Paona.name: The Departure of St. Abba Noub the Confessor.

24 Paona.name: Martyrdom of the Great Saint Anba Moses the Black

25 Paona.name: The Martyrdom of St. Jude, one of the Seventy Disciples.
The Departure of St. Peter the Fourth, 34th Pope of Alexandria.

26 Paona.name: The Departure of the Great Prophet Joshua Son of Nun.
The Consecration of the Church of Archangel Gabriel.

27 Paona.name: The Martyrdom of St. Ananias, the Apostle.
The Martyrdom of St. Thomas of Shentalet.

28 Paona.name: The Departure of St. Theodosius, 33rd Pope of Alexandria.
The Commemoration of the Consecration of the Church of Anba Sarabamoun, Bishop of Nikios.

29 Paona.name: The Martyrdom of the Seven Ascetic Saints in Tounar Mount.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Abba Hour and his Mother Theodora.

30 Paona.name: The Nativity of St. John, the Baptist.

1 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of Saint Febronia the Ascetic.
The Departure of Saints Bioukha and Tayaban (Banayen) the priests.

2 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Thaddaeus, the Apostle.

3 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Kyrillos (Cyril) the First, the Twenty- Fourth Pope of Alexandria.
The Departure of St. Celestine, Pope of Rome.

4 Abib.name: The Commemoration of the Relocation of the Relics of Sts. Apakir and John.

5 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Peter and Paul, the Apostles.

6 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Aoulimpas, the Apostle.
The Martyrdom of St. Theodosia and her companions.

7 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Shenouda (Shenoute), the Archimandrite.
The Martyrdom of St Ignatius, Bishop of Antioch, in Rome.

8 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Anba Bishoy.
The Martyrdom of St. Piroou and St. Athom.
The Martyrdom of St. Balanah, the Priest.
The Departure of Cyrus (Karas), brother of Emperor Theodosius.

9 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Simon Cleophas, the Apostle.
The Departure of St. Cladianus (Celadion), the Ninth Pope of the See of St. Mark.

10 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Theodore, Bishop of Pentapolis.
The Martyrdom of St. Theodore, Bishop of Corinth, and his companions.
The Departure of Anba Gabriel VII, 95th Pope of Alexandria.

11 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. John and Simon, his cousin.
The Departure of St. Isaiah, the hermit.

12 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Abba Hour El-Siriakousy.

13 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Pisentius, Bishop of Qift.
The Martyrdom of St. Apamon of Toukh.
The Martyrdom of St. Abba Shenoute, during the Early Arab Rule.

14 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Procopius (Proconius) of Jerusalem.
The Departure of St. Peter the Fifth, 83rd Patriarch of Alexandria.

15 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Ephraem El-Soriani (The Syrian).
The Martyrdom of St. Cyriacus and St. Julietta His Mother.
The Martyrdom of St. Horesius (Harsios) of Soul.

16 Abib.name: The Departure of St. John, of the Golden Gospel.
The Recovery of the Holy Relics of St. George, the Great Martyr.

18 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Apostle, Bishop of Jerusalem.

19 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Bidaba, Bishop of Qift, Anba Andrew, and Anba Christodoulas.
The Martyrdom of St. Pantaleemon, the Physician.
The Departure of Pope Youanis X, 85th Patriarch of Alexandria.

20 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Theodore of Shotep.

21 Abib.name: The Commemoration of the Lady, the Virgin Mary.
The Departure of St. Sisinnios (Sosenius), the Eunich.

22 Abib.name: The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Macarius, the Son of Basilides (Wasilides) the Minister.
The Commemoration of the Martyrdom of St. Leontius of Tripoli (Lawendius).

23 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of St. Longinus the Soldier.
The Martyrdom of St. Marina, of Antioch.

24 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Simeon the First, 42nd Pope of Alexandria.

25 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of the Saint Abba Isaac.
The Martyrdom of Sts. Thecla and Mouji.
The Martyrdom of St. Antonius (Anthony) of Beba.
The Martyrdom of St. Domadius El-Souriani (The Syrian).
The Consecration of the Church of St. Mercurius.
The Departure of St. Palamon, the Father of the Monks.

26 Abib.name: Repose of St. Joseph the Carpentar
Repose of Timothy I, Pope of Alexanderia

27 Abib.name: The Consecration of the Church of St. Abba Fam.
The Martyrdom of St. Apamon (Abba Amoun).

28 Abib.name: The Departure of St. Mary Magdalene.

29 Abib.name: The Commemoration of the Translocation of the Relics of St. Andrew, the Apostle.

30 Abib.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Mercurius and Ephraem.

1 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of St. Apoli, Son of Justus.
The Departure of St. Kyrillos V (Cyril), 112th Pope of Alexandria.

3 Mesra.name: The Relocation of the Body of St. Simon (Simeon) the Stylite to the city of Antioch.
The Departure of Pope Abriamus (Primus), Fifth Patriarch of Alexandria.

4 Mesra.name: Consecration of the Church of the Great St. Anthony

5 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. John the Soldier.

7 Mesra.name: The Annunciation of St. Joachim with the Birth of the Virgin Mary.
The Departure of St. Timothy II (Timotheos), 26th Pope of Alexandria.

8 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of the Sts. Lazarus, Salomi, His Wife, and Their Children.
The Confession of St. Peter, the Apostle, that Christ is the Son of the Living God.

9 Mesra.name: Martyrdom of St.Ari, the Priest of Shatanouf .

11 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. Moisis, Bishop of Ouseem.

12 Mesra.name: The Commemoration of the Honorable Archangel Michael.
The Reign of the Righteous Emperor Constantine, the Great.

13 Mesra.name: The Feast of Transfiguration of Our Lord on Mount Tabor.

14 Mesra.name: The Commemoration of the Great Sign, the Lord had Manifested During the Papacy of St. Theophilus.

15 Mesra.name: The Commemoration of the Departure of St. Mary Known as Marina, the Ascetic.

16 Mesra.name: The Assumption of the Body of the Pure Virgin St. Mary.
The Departure of St. Mattias IV (Mattheos), 102nd Patriarch of Alexandria.

17 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of St. James the Soldier.

18 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. Alexander, Patriarch of Constantinople.
The Martyrdom of St. Eudaemon, of Armant (El-Armanti).

19 Mesra.name: The Translocation of the Body of St. Macarius to His Monastery in Scetis.

20 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of the Seven Young Men of Ephesus.

21 Mesra.name: The Commemoration of the Virgin, the Mother of God

22 Mesra.name: The Departure of Micah, the Prophet.

23 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of Thirty Thousand Christians in Alexandria.
The Martyrdom of St. Damian in Antioch.

24 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. Takla Haymanot, the Ethiopian.
The Departure of St. Thomas, Bishop of Mar'ash (Syria).

25 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. Bessarion, the Great.
The Departure of St. Macarius III, 114th Pope of Alexandria.

26 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of St. Moses (Moisees) and his Sister Sarah.
The Martyrdom of St. Agabius, the Soldier, and his Sister Thecla.

27 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Benjamin and his Sister Eudexia.
The Martyrdom of St. Mary, the Armenian.

28 Mesra.name: The father of the Tribes Jacob

29 Mesra.name: The Martyrdom of Sts. Athanasius, the Bishop, Gerasimus (Jarasimus), and Theodotus.
The Arrival of the Holy Relic of St. John, the Short, to the Wilderness of Scetis.

30 Mesra.name: The Departure of St. Malachi, the Prophet.

1 Nasie.name: The Martyrdom of St. Pishay (Abshai), the Antiochian.

2 Nasie.name: The Departure of St. Titus, the Apostle.

4 Nasie.name: The Departure of St. Leparius, Bishop of Rome.
The Departure of St. Poimen, the Hermit.

5 Nasie.name: The Departure of St. James, Bishop of Misre.
The Departure of the Righteous Amos, the Prophet.
The Departure of St. Barsoma, the "Naked".
The Departure of St. Yoannis XV, 99th Pope of Alexandria.
